item.title: Russian Open Spaces Traffic Fix v1.2 ETS2
item.description:
Russian Open Spaces Traffic Fix v1.2 ETS2

Changelogs v1.2
– Fixed crashes in freight market due to missing pmd/pmg file

Fix for traffic from Russian Open Spaces spawning everywhere.
Now the traffic will only spawn in Russia and Belarus.

Required Content
Russian Open Spaces



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: The Godfather’s Ownable Trucks Paintjob Pack v1.0 ATS
item.description:
The Godfather’s Ownable Trucks Paintjob Pack v1.0 ATS

The Godfather’s ATS Ownable Trucks Paintjob Pack

This Pack has a load of Paintjobs Skins over a wide Range of Trucks for American Truck Simulator from the Standard SCS Trucks to a wide range of Mod Trucks both Free & Paided Trucks u will find some great Real Life Trucking Company’s from Australia and USA and other parts of the world plus Real Brands and much much more all done in high detail and all paintjobs are owned by The Godfather’s Mods Company EST 2021.

v1.0 (Release Edition August 25th 2024)
This is the Release edition of this pack witch has 104 paintjob skins over a wide range of SCS Trucks and Paided Mod Trucks and Free Mod Trucks..

item.title: DAF XF 530 Stebo Transport v3.0 ETS2
item.description:
DAF XF 530 Stebo Transport v3.0 ETS2

This truck works on versions 1.50 and higher

Full Standalone
Full Lightmask
Full animation
RED interior light as accessory
Support SiSL’s Mega Pack
Personal wheels
Has interior tuning

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.

item.title: Vangs Tipp by Kast v1.1 ETS2
item.description:
Vangs Tipp by Kast v1.1 ETS2

Vangs side tipper trailers and truck parts for ETS2

Includes:
– Semi-trailer
– Full-trailers
– Tyllis Dolly for semi-trailer
– Truck parts
– Custom & SCS Cargo options
– Templates

Game version 1.50.x
Trailers are all standalone, working without any other mod needed, but for trucks, you need rigid/tandem addons to be activated!



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: New Service v1.50 ETS2
item.description:
New Service v1.50 ETS2

This mod replaces one of the service and repair stations.
The station has been fully rebuild and adds some stuff like workers, parking trucks and an animated truck washing machine.

Changes and Additions:
– Added a few more details
– Truck lift’s has been moved further inside the workshop
– Animation of the cross brush has been slightly increased
– The washing station is now animated in all cities where the station exists
– Brush added for the truck front and the trailer top
– Added a barrier (no collision yet) which opens when the cleaning is finished
– Added a passage for the washing station
– Truck lift has been moved forward towards the entrance
– Added washing device for trailers

Game version: 1.50.x



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD
